title: WiBit.Net Video Tutorial - How To Code a C++ Dynamic Array Class
description:
/* ************************************************************************** */
/* ************************ WiBit.Net Video Tutorial ************************ */
/* ************************************************************************** */
Title          : How To Code a C++ Dynamic Array Class
Num Videos     : 12
Lesson Length  : 54 minutes 15 seconds
Resolution     : 800 x 600
Codec Download : http://www.techsmith.com/download/codecs.asp
Date Recorded  : 12/19/2006
Narrator(s)    : Kevin Willett
OS:            : Microsoft Windows Vista
Software       : QT Designer, KDevelop
Description    : This tutorial series shows you (line-by-line) how to code a 
                 dynamic array class in C++ using Visual Studio. However, 
                 any C++ compiler will work! I recorded these on a plane
                 flight and I unfortunately did not have an opportunity to 
                 record audio! So it?s just moving pictures. But it?s still 
                 some great information!
=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-
-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-= Video List -=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=
=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-
Video 1        : Setting Up The Project
Video 2        : Coding Private Data
Video 3        : Coding Public Data: Constructor
Video 4        : Coding Public Data: Size
Video 5        : Coding Public Data: Add
Video 6        : Coding Public Data: Get
Video 7        : Coding Public Data: Clear
Video 8        : Coding Public Data: Insert
Video 9        : Demo: Names List
Video 10       : Demo: Chinese Remainder Theorem
Videl 11       : Get Class File
Video 12       : Demo: Structs
/* ************************************************************************** */
/* ***************************** About WiBit.Net **************************** */
/* ************************************************************************** */
WiBit was a website used by college students (and one professor) from Towson 
University in Baltimore, Maryland as a repository for learning materials. The
site creators were former Computer Science and Computer Security students, 
Kevin Willett and Bryan Stouffer. The first WiBit Tutorials were created by 
Kevin as a study aid for himself in late 2003. Over the following years Kevin
and Bryan decided to create a few tutorials and give themselves and their
fellow students a place to view and use them. Some were used as presentation
aids and students teaching students seminars. Over 30 tutorials were created!
The WiBit Tutorials served themselves well! All the students involved in the
project became professionals in their field of study. The creators Kevin and 
Bryan currently develop medical software. Others are working for great 
companies such as Bowing and Lockheed Martin. Since college the need to 
create tutorials has died down, but who knows what the future holds!
